REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0987 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-REC 03-26 0082

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET RECEIVES 226 MLN STG ASSISTANCE
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it operated in the money market this afternoon, buying 226 mln stg in bills. In band one, the central bank bought 37 mln stg treasury bills and 72 mln stg bank bills at 9-7/8 pct together with 117 mln stg band two bank bills at 9-13/16 pct. This brings total money market help so far today to 241 mln stg and compares with the Bank's revised estimate of a 350 mln stg shortfall. REUTER
